summary: This is a docket activity notice from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals for case 19-2221, United States v. Epstein, indicating that attorney Reid Weingarten was added to the case on July 25, 2019.

persons.name: Reid Weingarten
persons.context: Attorney added to the case as indicated in the docket activity notice from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals.

events.title: Attorney Added to Epstein Appeal
events.description: Reid Weingarten was added as an attorney in the appellate case United States v. Epstein (19-2221) in the Second Circuit Court of Appeals.

keyFacts: The document is a docket activity notice from the Second Circuit Court of Appeals for case 19-2221, United States v. Epstein.
Attorney Reid Weingarten was added to the case on July 25, 2019.
The notice includes standard PACER access fee information for public users.
